content:
StreamingEndpointState StreamingEndpointState Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll

Describes the state of a streaming endpoint.

Edit

In this Article

public enum StreamingEndpointStatePublic Enum StreamingEndpointState

Fields

Deleting Deleting

Streaming endpoint is being deleted
Running Running

Streaming endpoint is running.
Scaling Scaling

Streaming endpoint is scaling.
Starting Starting

Streaming endpoint is starting.
Stopped Stopped

Streaming endpoint is stopped.
Stopping Stopping

Streaming endpoint is stopping.
